team.floracore.common.util

类 ItemBuilder

  • java.lang.Object
    • team.floracore.common.util.ItemBuilder

  • public class ItemBuilder
extends java.lang.Object
    ItemBuilder - An API class to create an ItemStack with just one line of code!

      • toConfig

        public static void toConfig(org.bukkit.configuration.file.FileConfiguration cfg,
                            java.lang.String path,
                            ItemBuilder builder)
        Converts the Item to a ConfigStack and writes it to path
        参数:
        cfg - Configuration File to which it should be written
        path - Path to which the ConfigStack should be written
        builder - Which ItemBuilder should be written

        返回:

public ItemBuilder.Unsafe unsafe()
